title: Bandbox Lid, 1800–50
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Bandbox lid, the sides of which are broken in pieces but still attached. Printed in a bold black and white geometric pattern, resembling pyramids.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bandbox Lid, 1800–50.
1800–50. Block-printed. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-118.
